EmailConfig.SelecionaRegistros: SELECT IDEPACTAR FROM TPACTAR INNER JOIN TPLAACO ON TPLAACO.IDEPLAACO = TPACTAR.IDEPLAACO INNER JOIN TLICAMB ON TLICAMB.IDEPLAACOPRGAMB = TPLAACO.IDEPLAACO WHERE ((ENVAVSEXC = 1 --AVISO NO DIA DA EXECUÇÃO AND ((FREREC = 0 AND (DATEADD(DD, DATEDIFF(DD, 0, GETDATE()), 0) = DATEADD(DD, DATEDIFF(DD, 0, CASE WHEN INIPRE IS NULL OR INIREA IS NOT NULL THEN FIMPRE ELSE INIPRE END), 0))) OR (FREREC <> 0 AND DATEADD(DD, DATEDIFF(DD, 0, GETDATE()), 0) = DATEADD(DD, DATEDIFF(DD, 0, COALESCE(PRXEXCREC, INIPRE)), 0)))) OR (ENVAVSEXC = 2 --AVISO UMA SEMANA ANTES DA EXECUÇÃO AND ((FREREC = 0 AND DATEADD(DD, DATEDIFF(DD, 0, GETDATE()), 0) = DATEADD(DD, DATEDIFF(DD, 0, CASE WHEN INIPRE IS NULL OR INIREA IS NOT NULL THEN FIMPRE ELSE INIPRE END), -7)) OR (FREREC <> 0 AND DATEADD(DD, DATEDIFF(DD, 0, GETDATE()), 0) = DATEADD(DD, DATEDIFF(DD, 0, COALESCE(PRXEXCREC, INIPRE)), 0) -7))) OR (ENVAVSEXC = 3 --AVISO UM MÊS ANTES DA EXECUÇÃO AND ((FREREC = 0 AND DATEADD(DD, DATEDIFF(DD, 0, GETDATE()), 0) = DATEADD(MM, -1, DATEADD(DD, DATEDIFF(DD, 0, CASE WHEN INIPRE IS NULL OR INIREA IS NOT NULL THEN FIMPRE ELSE INIPRE END), 0))) OR (FREREC <> 0 AND DATEADD(DD, DATEDIFF(DD, 0, GETDATE()), 0) = DATEADD(MM, -1, DATEADD(DD, DATEDIFF(DD, 0, COALESCE(PRXEXCREC, INIPRE)), 0))))) OR (ENVAVSEXC = 4 --AVISO NA DATA ESPECIFICADA AND DATEADD(DD, DATEDIFF(DD, 0, GETDATE()), 0) = DATEADD(DD, DATEDIFF(DD, 0, DTAAVSEXC), 0))) AND TPACTAR.STTEML <> 2 AND TPACTAR.DEL = 0 AND FIMREA IS NULL
EmailConfig.SelecionaDestinatarios: SELECT CASE WHEN TPACTAR.IDEUSURES IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE TUSU.IDEUSU END IDEUSU, CASE WHEN TPACTAR.NMEUSURES IS NULL THEN TUSU.NME ELSE TPACTAR.NMEUSURES END NME, CASE WHEN TPACTAR.EMLUSURES IS NULL THEN TUSU.EML ELSE TPACTAR.EMLUSURES END EML FROM TUSU RIGHT JOIN TPACTAR ON TUSU.IDEUSU = TPACTAR.IDEUSURES WHERE TPACTAR.IDEPACTAR = [IDEPACTAR] UNION SELECT TPACTAR.IDEUSUELB IDEUSU, TUSU.NME NME, TUSU.EML EML FROM TPACTAR INNER JOIN TUSU ON TUSU.IDEUSU = TPACTAR.IDEUSUELB WHERE TPACTAR.IDEPACTAR = [IDEPACTAR]
EmailConfig.SelecionaInformacoes: SELECT TTIPLICREGAMB.DES TIPEMP, TEPRLICAMB.NME NMEPRJ, VUNI.SIG SIGUNI, TLICAMB.CODINT, TTIPLICAMB.DES TIPLIC, TLICAMB.NUMPCS, TPACTAR.WHT, CASE WHEN TPACTAR.FREREC = 0 THEN CASE WHEN TPACTAR.INIPRE IS NULL OR TPACTAR.INIREA IS NOT NULL THEN TPACTAR.FIMPRE ELSE TPACTAR.INIPRE END ELSE COALESCE(TPACTAR.PRXEXCREC, INIPRE) END DTAEXC FROM TLICAMB INNER JOIN TPLAACO ON TLICAMB.IDEPLAACOPRGAMB = TPLAACO.IDEPLAACO INNER JOIN TPACTAR ON TPACTAR.IDEPLAACO = TPLAACO.IDEPLAACO INNER JOIN TEPRLICAMB ON TLICAMB.IDEEPRLICAMB = TEPRLICAMB.IDEEPRLICAMB INNER JOIN TTIPLICREGAMB ON TEPRLICAMB.IDETIPLICREGAMB = TTIPLICREGAMB.IDETIPLICREGAMB INNER JOIN VUNI ON VUNI.IDEUNI = TEPRLICAMB.IDEUNI INNER JOIN TTIPLICAMB ON TTIPLICAMB.IDETIPLICAMB = TLICAMB.IDETIPLICAMB WHERE TPACTAR.IDEPACTAR = [IDEPACTAR]
EmailConfig.ResetOnSend: UPDATE TPACTAR SET TPACTAR.STTEML = 2, TPACTAR.UPDTME = GETDATE() WHERE TPACTAR.IDEPACTAR = [IDEPACTAR]
